review: it works great as long as you keep your modem for the Wi-Fi within good or "not-so-far" distance from it. for instance I had my computer in another room "with the modem for my internet connection" and the Fire Stick in the living room plugged into the TV and it would not connect correctly until I relocated the modem. But until I figured out what the problem was it just wouldn't work. I believe that should be noted when the Fire Stick is purchased to avoid a lot of problems as well as trouble for the customers that purchase it.
